content.body: Am I thinking of this wrong. With web components if you have nested web components and use cloneNode(true) on the root it just constructs new web component nodes. All of their public/private data isn't copied. Also cloneNode(true) doesn't recursively call cloneNode on children, so you can't just override it in your web component to copy over the members. It seems assumed that everything public/private member is backed by an
attribute so that cloning creates a perfect copy?
The closest discussion I found is this: https://github.com/WICG/webcomponents/issues/176
